channel.title: Making Npcs Walk 562? Help. REP++
channel.description: Hmmmrhhhh.... All afternoon i've been looking for a tutorial about making npcs walk on 562. Im useing Rs2hd base. There's something called waypoints? I dont realy understand these at all. Could some one help me on making them walk? thanks alot, :')!

item.title: Making Npcs Walk 562? Help. REP++

Hmmmrhhhh…
All afternoon i’ve been looking for a tutorial about making npcs walk on 562.
